page.title: 11RECREATION FACILITIES
page.content: RECREATION FACILITIES - Venues used for Indoor Events - Village Hall Legion Hut School Vicarage Various activities take place - Badminton. Table Tennis. Snooker etc., School Playing Field use for sports. Childrens play area. 2 Public Houses - Miners & Gate Inn - venues for Darts, Dominoes & meetings. HIGH peak Railway now High Peak Trail a great tourist attraction with cinder track for cycling, walking and horse riding. Rainster Rocks for walking & climbing. WAKES WEEK - a popular and traditional programme of events. It begins on the last Sunday in Agust- open air United Service/Band Concert,Crowning of Queen The programme includes bingo.Whist & beetle drives,car treasure hunt, children's treats, Carnival day.
